description: Alicia Loxley and Tom Steinfort present the Melbourne news, leading with a principal stabbed and a Keysborough college locked down after a fight involving two staff members. Ash Gordon's teen killer is jailed for 17 years, and his grieving father has a parting message. title: 9News Sydney | Tuesday December 2 | Full Episode
description: Peter Overton leads the Sydney news, with a delicate rescue in Blacktown after a police car smashes into a house, injuring a female officer. title: 9News Brisbane | Tuesday December 2 | Full Episode
